word: G1626 - ἔκτρωμα - éktrōma - ek'-tro-mah - Born out of due time

sections.paragraph: சுருக்க விளக்கம் / Short Definition: Born out of due time
an abortion, abortive birth; an untimely birth
Part(s) of speech: Noun Neuter / பெயர்ச்சொல் (அஃறிணை)
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From a compound of G1537 and τιτρώσκω titrōskō (to wound); a miscarriage (abortion), that is, (by analogy) untimely birth: - born out of due time.
